result.eng: Mind the gap between the door and the plaform.

result.eng: Is this the road between Belfast and Derry?

result.eng: There isn't much space between the two houses.
result.ga: Níl mórán spáis idir an dá theach
result.orig: Níl mórán spáis idir an dá theach
result.html: Níl mórán spáis idir an dá theachThere isn't much space between the two houses.
result.ponchtml: Níl mórán spáis idir an dá ṫeaċThere isn't much space between the two houses.

result.eng: It was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ga: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.orig: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.html: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir go raiḃ tú idir ḋá ċoṁairle maidir leis an ḟreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.

result.eng: I knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.
result.ga: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnte
result.orig: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnte
result.html: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnteI knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ḟios agam go raiḃ idirḋealú éigin ann idir an dá rud aċ ní raiḃ mé cinnteI knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.

result.eng: Both men and women were there.
result.ga: Bhí idir fhir agus mhná ann
result.orig: Bhí idir fhir agus mhná ann
result.html: Bhí idir fhir agus mhná annBoth men and women were there.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí idir ḟir agus ṁná annBoth men and women were there.

result.eng: I didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ga: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht

result.eng: You divide the load between two lorries.
result.ga: Roinneann tú an t-ualach idir dhá leoraí
result.orig: Roinneann tú an t-ualach idir dhá leoraí

result.eng: This site is under construction.
result.ga: Tá an láithreán seo idir lámha

result.html: Tá an láithreán seo idir lámhaThis site is under construction.
result.ponchtml: Tá an láiṫreán seo idir láṁaThis site is under construction.

result.eng: The plan is designed to promote cooperation between the member states.

result.eng: There are many similarities between the two things.

result.eng: They are engaged in a new project.

result.eng: I have my lunch between one and two.

result.eng: Between five and half past five.

result.eng: There are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.

result.eng: But competition between the suppliers was fierce and the profits were narrow.
